bibl.title: Masks of Authority. Fiction and Pragmatics in Ancient Greek Poetics. Translated from the French by Peter M. BURK. (Myth and Poetics.)
bibl.note: Traduit de: Masques d'autorité. Fiction et pragmatique dans la poétique grecque antique = L'Âne d'or (Paris, 2005).
CALAME Claude, Masks of Authority. Fiction and Pragmatics in Ancient Greek Poetics. Translated from the French by Peter M. BURK. (Myth and Poetics.)
Ithaca, Cornell University Press, 2005, 8°, 280 pp. ISBN 0-8014-3892-6. $49.95.
